posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info1: Deployment

posts.title: 第一篇文章
posts.text: 我的第一篇博客这是我的一个hexo博客，记录一些博客内容，同时也会同步到订阅号1 helloworld
